records.location_details: Libyan Search and Rescue Region (SRR), Maltese SRR. Migrant boat departed from Libya. Rescue by Libyan vessel.
records.note_contesto: Frontex surveillance aircraft detected a migrant boat in the Libyan/Maltese SRR. A Libyan vessel performed the rescue. Instances of violence against two migrants by Libyan crew members were observed. The Fundamental Rights Office expressed concern regarding the ill-treatment and the lack of clarity from Maltese authorities on SAR coordination and non-refoulement, noting Libya is not a safe port.
records.evidenza_testuale: reported instances of violence against two (2) migrants by at least three (3) crew members of the Libyan vessel
